phrases: What?
Huh?
You mean...
Like I just said, they have decided to demolish...
Sakura
Hall at the end of the year.
You will be moving into the regular dorms in April, so start packing.
Wh-What
It is great news, kouhai-kun!
Have not you been listening to what Chihiro-chan's been saying?
Are not you happy that they are going to rebuild Sakura Hall?
I am already so excited, I do not know what to do with myself!
I will not be able to sleep tonight!
In fact, I would rather sleep through the day!
Rebuild?
Is this actually a positive thing?
No.
When I said they are getting rid of Sakura Hall, I meant it.
They are not rebuilding it at all.
It is going to disappear completely.
Chihiro-chan, I do not remember hearing or accepting anything like that!
Who made that decision?
An expert inspected...
the building's condition over winter break.
Winter break?
Oh, right.
I am locking up Sakura Hall at the end of this year.
What?
I am going to go have some fun in Australia.
You will all have to go home.
Are you saying you tricked us?!
Calm down, Sorata.
This does not make sense.
Sakura
Hall is old, but it is not so old...
that it needs to be torn down right away.
If they have to demolish it, cannot they wait until these guys graduate?
If you just tell us they decided to demolish it,
Chihiro-chan, you realize we will fight this decision.
It was decided in a board meeting.
They even gave you permission to keep...
your cats in the regular dorms for a while.
That is all.
Dismissed.
Sensei!
We can still live in Sakura Hall.
I will convince the principal to change his mind!
Do not bother.
If you go after the principal, he might never recover.
It is not a good idea to portray Sakura Hall...
in a worse light than it already is.
But I cannot accept this!
I cannot believe they would ignore the opinions of the current residents.
She is right.
And doing it so underhandedly, too
Are you sure?
Misaki and I are graduating, but for you,
this is a unique opportunity to return to the regular dorms.
But...
The regular dorms are nice and clean,
and you will never be bothered by drafts again.
The cafeteria workers will prepare your meals for you.
Unlike this place, you will never need to worry about various things.
That is not the point
For you, Kanda, you will be able to use your free time...
to prepare for the title screening.
Akasaka, do not you care if Sakura Hall just disappears?
I am calmly weighing the pros and cons.
That is all.
Hey!
Well, let us not get ahead of ourselves.
We should consider all of those things, too.
To think the first thing I heard after coming back...
was the news of this dorm being demolished.
Jin, does it really not bother you that Sakura Hall's going to disappear?
Of course it does.
We owe them.
It is our turn to do what we can for them.
If we cannot convince the principal, what should we do?
Their reasoning for suddenly demolishing this building does not make sense.
If it was something they could tell us,
they would have told us by now.
What are you going to do?
Well, for now...
Yeah, do not worry.
No matter what happens, I will take care of you.
You understand the situation, do not you?
Sakura
Hall is going to disappear, right?
That is right.
You know what that means, do not you?
From April, we will all live in the regular dorms.
What?
I am surprised you understood that much.
No matter what happens, you will take care of me.
I knew you did not understand.
Listen, I cannot do that in the regular dorms.
Why not?
Men and women eat separately,
and men cannot enter the women's dorm.
I will not be able to...
wake you up every morning or cook for you anymore.
That is a problem.
I like Sakura Hall.
You are right.
At first, I wanted to leave as soon as I found homes for them.
That is the picture we took when I first arrived here.
Everyone is in it.
Now that I think of it, the principal made me move here.
Principal's Office
Kanda Sorata-kun, do you understand why...
you have been summoned here?
Yes.
It is about my cat, is not it?
We have been turning a blind eye for the last month,
but keeping live animals in the dorms is against the rules.
Get rid of the cat...
or leave the regular dorms and move into Sakura Hall.
Your choice.
I will move into Sakura Hall.
Kanda-kun?!
Do you have any regrets?
None!
So, you accepted your fate.
Yeah, I am at that age...
when kids like to rebel against authority.
You are an idiot.
What else could I do?
He told me I could not keep my cat in the regular dorms!
Are you really going to move into Sakura Hall?
Once you are exiled to that place, you are done for!
You will never be able to return to a normal life!
Sakura
Hall is the one place you should never go!
That is what they say about Sakura Hall!
Do not worry.
I will find someone to take Hikari and return...
to the regular dorms by the second semester.
Sakura Hall
So far, it is about three times more rundown than I expected.
It is okay.
It is not as though aliens or ghosts live here.
There is nothing to be afraid of.
Excuse me!
How careless.
I am coming in!
My room is...
Kanda Sorata
Room 101.
It is pretty big.
It looks like it is been properly cleaned, too.
This place is great.
There is even storage...
Maybe I am just too tired.
Burglar!
You give up, Mr. Burglar?
I am not a burglar!
I am a first-year student...
Wait, are you the second year, Kamiigusa-senpai?
How does a burglar know my name?!
Because you are famous.
You are the art scholarship student...
who made that hugely popular anime...
Punishment!
Y-You have got the wrong idea!
I am Kanda Sorata, a first year,
and I will be living here starting today!
That is what all the burglars say!
No, they do not!
This is Hikari.
They kicked me out of the regular dorms for owning a cat.
I see.
Soratan and Hikarin, is it?
So you are more of a cat person than a dog person?
What?
I-I suppose I am.
I am definitely a this person!
Was that even one of the options?
I am Soratan.
Anyway, Soratan...
Please do not call me that.
What am I, a moe character?
Sorapyon
Okay then, Sorapyon...
Now I am some lazy mascot!
Okay then, Sorani...
Now I am an organic compound...
What do not you like about them, Soranya?
Friends give each other nicknames.
My head's starting to hurt.
Anyway, Tan-Tan.
That does not even resemble my name anymore.
The CEO of a certain company...
would go jogging in the park every morning.
Okay.
The park was littered with empty cans.
Unable to ignore them, the CEO decided...
to pick one up every day he went jogging.
But because a lot more cans...
were thrown away than the CEO could pick up,
there were increasingly more cans, not fewer.
But the CEO kept picking cans up every day.
Unbelievably, after a considerable length of time,
the number of cans began decreasing.
Truth was, other runners were inspired by the CEO...
and had begun picking up cans, as well.
Fin
Sounds like a nice story...
It is a nice story!
It means humans are not so bad.
Even though some throw away cans.
So, why did you suddenly tell me this nice story?
No reason!
An alien!
Where?!
Right here!
You are a funny kid, Sorachi.
I was called funny by someone who is funny in the head.
Shut up already.
What is all the fuss about?
Sensei, help me!
Who are you?
I am moving in today...
Oh, right.
The principal said something crazy...
about a student joining Sakura Hall.
It is not crazy at all...
Anyway, Sensei, why are you dressed like that?
I am on my way to a mixer.
I do not have time to worry about my students.
What did you just say?!
Are you a boy or girl?
Boy or girl?
Why does summer have to be so hot?
A girl!
So you are Hikari-chan!
Does not make any sense.
I feel like my heart is breaking.
What have you been shouting about?
Jin, it is Soran!
He is moving into Room 101 today!
Then, his surname must be Yaren.
It is not!
I am Kanda Sorata, a freshman!
And this is Hikarin.
Ah, so you are the kid with the cat from the regular dorms.
I am Mitaka Jin.
I am in Room 103.
Nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you, Mitaka-senpai.
Do not call me Senpai.
Just call me Jin.
In that case, Jin-san, I would appreciate it if you could help me.
Misaki, go easy on him.
That is all you are going to do?!
Even if it is you asking, Jin, I cannot do that.
I want to become even better friends with him.
She did not use honorifics?
Misaki and I are childhood friends.
Of course, that is not the full extent of our relationship...
My girlfriend is a married woman.
I am about to go on a date with her.
What?
See you later.
What is it?!
What did Jin say?!
Come on, keep it together, Soranyan!
Hey!
Sakura Hall
Victory!
That is 98 wins in a row!
Only two more for 100 consecutive wins!
I would like to unpack my stuff soon...
You can do that anytime.
You are living here from now on, Sora-chan.
I am leaving as soon as I find someone to take Hikari!
Save it for after you have beaten me.
That is 99 wins in a row!
After all the time I have spent playing this game...
I believe professional wrestlers are the greatest warriors!
Professional wrestlers are really strong!
You are just needlessly strong, Senpai!
Could I at least take a bath?
What are you?
A little girl worried she might stink...
of sweat in front of the boy she likes?
Why are you standing so far away?
N-No reason.
Stay away.
What is your problem?
Do what you want.
You will give him the wrong idea.
But I am a guy...
Anyway, I am going to go take a bath.
What?!
You are abandoning your 100 win streak?
Girl In Bathroom!!
I guess I will have some water and try to relax.
Huh?
What could be making that noise at this hour?
S-Sensei?
Or is it you, Jin-san?
Are you back already?
G-G-G-Gho...
The room next door...
That was a real live person, was not it?
What are you screaming about?
Another monster!
You got a death wish or something?
Oh, Sensei.
It is you.
You are back from your mixer?
A long time ago.
All of them sucked, but they kept going on about how...
my personality's terrible and I drink too much.
Those idiots!
More importantly, I just saw a g-g-gho
You saying I look old and withered?
I am still in my twenties.
Nobody said anything like that.
I just saw a ghost.
Its hair reached all the way down to its waist.
It disappeared into the room next to mine!
Oh, yeah.
He comes out of there sometimes.
So there is a ghost?!
Akasaka Ryunosuke in Room 102.
What?
Kanda Sorata Akasaka Ryunosuke Mitaka Jin
I would completely forgotten about him.
I have only seen him about three times.
Akasaka Ryunosuke
Sensei, do not you look after this place?!
Akasaka's an extreme recluse.
He is a first year like you,
but he has not gone to school once since he enrolled.
You are pretty lucky to meet Akasaka on the day you moved in.
Please do not treat a reclusive student...
like some kind of good luck fairy.
It really is amazing.
Your reaction is far more amazing!
Anyway, is not it your responsibility to make him go to school?
Making someone do something they do not want to do...
will just make their life unpleasant.
You have thought this through.
I am sorry.
That is why I do not do any work at Sakura Hall.
I do not want to.
You were talking about yourself?!
Here.
What?
If you want to talk to Akasaka, text him.
That is his number.
Wait
He lives in the room next to mine and I have to text him?
Let us see.
That should do it.
Composing Message My name's Kanda Sorata, and I have moved into Room 101.
Nice to meet you.
Sending
Message Received Akasaka Ryunosuke
That was quick.
What is it say?
Ryunosuke-sama is currently developing a motion engine... okay?
Akasaka Ryunosuke Subject: none Ryunosuke-sama is currently developing a motion engine, okay?
He cannot answer your message, okay?
He cannot answer your message, okay?
Yours sincerely, the recently born Maid-chan.
Um, how am I supposed to interpret this?
Akasaka, you are a funny guy.
Akasaka Ryunosuke Subject: What is the joke?
Maid-chan is working as hard as she can, okay?
From Maid-chan.
Maid-chan is working as hard as she can, okay?
From Maid-chan.
Enough of that.
Cannot you talk to me normally?
I am talking normally, okay?
Sorata-kun, you must be a stupid kid, okay?
From Maid-chan.
Akasaka-kun, could you stop ending your sentences like that?
It is annoying.
What is up with this conversation?
I am not Ryunosuke-sama, okay?
From Maid-chan.
That is ridiculous!
Quit making fun of me!
That is ridiculous!
Quit making fun of me!
Message Received Akasaka Ryunosuke
Maid-chan is an AI program I created to answer...
my messages automatically.
She composes appropriate responses...
within a second of receiving a message and sends replies.
You could not even figure that out?
Akasaka Ryunosuke Subject: none
Do not waste my time.
Akasaka Ryunosuke
No one would expect you to use...
an automatic answering program for your personal number!
Akasaka Ryunosuke Subject: I see.
I had no idea someone existed in this world who could not understand that.
Sorry.
That is all.
I had no idea someone existed...
in this world who could not understand that.
Sorry.
That is all.
I do not feel like I have been apologized to at all!
Thanks for waiting!
I was not waiting for you!
Sorachi, let us play Metal Cluster next.
What?
Is not that a single-player game?
We will play in turns and compare our scores.
Watch me play for about three hours first.
It will be morning by then.
Anyway, why did you come dressed like that?
Please leave!
Do not sweat the small stuff.
Sit down, Sorapu.
Fine.
If you will not leave, Kamiigusa-senpai...
Then I will!
I cannot stay here any longer!
Come on, Sorapi!
What am I going to do now?
No!
Absolutely not!
There is no way they would let me keep a second one!
I am home.
Keep quiet.
What are you doing?
Jin-san, did you just get home?
Meiko-san did not give me a chance to sleep.
H-How adult of you.
Is Meiko-san someone else's wife?
Yeah.
I have three other girlfriends, though.
You have four girlfriends?!
And who is your cutie there?
I picked her up in the park...
Ah.
What is her name?
I am thinking of calling her Nozomi.
If you pick up a third one, you will have to call her Kodama.
There will not be a third.
I am not even sure they will let me keep a second one.
What is this?!
As you can see, it is a new resident welcoming party.
It is six in the morning!
Misaki insisted on doing it.
That is why I wandered home at this hour.
I am glad you went out so I could make it a surprise, Sorakyun.
You did this all yourself?
Misaki was looking forward to having a new resident.
She is been keeping this room clean by herself...
so it would always be ready for someone to move in.
That is why it was so tidy.
But why hotpot?
We always serve hotpot at Sakura Hall welcoming parties.
Yeah, but in the middle of summer?
Do not worry about that.
Sit, sit.
Hey...
Who is that?
Is she a new resident, too?
Yeah.
I just picked her up in the park.
I was hoping it would be all right for me to keep another cat.
Let us hold a Sakura Hall meeting, then!
A Sakura Hall meeting?
When we have to make a decision,
we hold a meeting with all the residents.
Her name's Nozomi, apparently.
Okay, who thinks it would be fine to keep Nozomi?
Me!
Ryunosuke has no objections, either.
That is great.
Are you sure you want to make this decision so easily?
What about the teacher's permission?
We do not need it.
That is how this place works.
Come on.
Let us keep partying!
Nozomi!
Hikari!
Kouhai-kun!
Eat up!
Let us use that.
Huh?
My nickname.
I would like you to call me kouhai-kun, Kamiigusa-senpai.
You can call me by my name, then.
We are friends now.
Okay.
Misaki-senpai it is.
Get a little closer.
Sakura Hall
What about Akasaka?
Do not worry about him.
I will add him in later.
Add him?
I am starting to get the feeling we will be together for a long time.
Do not joke about that!
I am going to find owners for these cats...
and leave by the second semester!
Come on, kouhai-kun!
We are taking the picture!
Strike a pose!
I am definitely leaving!
It was only Hikari at first...
Komachi made these scratches.
I have tripped down these stairs.
And I have fixed the front door plenty of times.
Sakura
Hall is definitely rundown.
It is cold in the winter and hot in the summer.
The floor in the hallway falls through from time to time,
and the lock on my door is broken,
so I have no privacy.
The second floor leaks, too.
But...
Yeah.
I realize now that everything that used to bother me has turned into memories.
When the bath broke and we went to the public baths together.
When we took out that hornet nest.
You are right.
I have been filling up my journal faster since I came to Sakura Hall.
I feel like I would be losing something important...
if Sakura Hall disappeared.
I do not want that.
Well said, kouhai-kun.
You are exactly right.
The hotpot party on the roof.
Turning Sakura
Hall into a haunted house over the summer,
and inviting all the kids in the neighborhood.
Playing possum every day when you came back.
They are all wonderful memories.
Well, all your memories also involve someone getting mad at you.
A lot has happened, but I believe we belong here.
What do you think, Akasaka?
Pros and cons aside,
Sender: Mitaka Jin Subject: The real reason for tearing down the building Can you hack the server and investigate?
it disgusts me that their reason for doing this is not clear.
I like Sakura Hall.
So do I.
That is why...
We will stop them from tearing it down.
Sounds good.
Yeah!
Okay, let us hold a Sakura Hall meeting.
The curtain's rising on our first defense of Sakura Hall.
Is everyone ready?
Yeah!
Yeah, I do not have any time to get all depressed.
Life has its ups and downs.
There is no way I would fall any farther.
I have got a feeling a lot of good things will happen next week.
Do not, ponytail.
You will set a downer flag.
